original_text: The lot for the East Gate fell to Shelemiah. Then lots were cast for his son Zechariah, a wise counselor, and the lot for the North Gate fell to him.
korean_text: 셀레먀는 동쪽을 뽑았고 그의 아들 스가랴는 명철한 모사라 모사를 위하여 제비 뽑으니 북쪽을 뽑았고

sentences.original_text: The lot for the East Gate fell to Shelemiah.
Then lots were cast for his son Zechariah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그의 아들 스가랴를 위해 제비가 뽑혔는데,

sentences.original_text: and the lot for the North Gate fell to him.
